scripts.build:packages: pnpm --filter=@cpp.js/package-iconv run build && pnpm --filter=@cpp.js/package-zlib run build && pnpm --filter=@cpp.js/package-expat run build && pnpm --filter=@cpp.js/package-webp run build && pnpm --filter=@cpp.js/package-tiff run build && pnpm --filter=@cpp.js/package-sqlite3 run build && pnpm --filter=@cpp.js/package-proj run build && pnpm --filter=@cpp.js/package-geotiff run build && pnpm --filter=@cpp.js/package-geos run build && pnpm --filter=@cpp.js/package-spatialite run build && pnpm --filter=@cpp.js/package-gdal run build
scripts.build:samples:wasm: pnpm --filter=@cpp.js/sample-web-* run build && pnpm --filter=@cpp.js/sample-cloud-* run build && pnpm --filter=@cpp.js/sample-backend-* run build && pnpm run build:samples:lib:wasm
scripts.build:: pnpm run build:packages; pnpm run build:samples;
scripts.clear:dist: find packages -name "*.xcframework" -type d -maxdepth 2 -exec rm -rf {} +; find packages -name "dist" -type d -maxdepth 2 -exec rm -rf {} +
scripts.clear: pnpm run clear:cache; pnpm run clear:dist; pnpm run clear:pack
scripts.ci:linux:build:package: pnpm --filter=@cpp.js/package-zlib run build:wasm && pnpm --filter=@cpp.js/package-zlib run build:android
scripts.ci:linux:build: pnpm run build:samples:lib:wasm && pnpm run build:samples:lib:android && pnpm run ci:linux:build:package
scripts.ci:windows:build: pnpm run build:samples:lib:wasm && pnpm run build:samples:lib:android && pnpm run ci:linux:build:package
scripts.ci:macos:build: pnpm run build:samples:lib:ios && pnpm run ci:ios:build:package
